verses.roman:
mahāprabhu tāre dekhi' baḍa kṛpā kailā
māsa-dui teṅho prabhura nikaṭe rahilā

synonyms: mahāprabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; tāre—him; dekhi'-seeing; baḍa kṛpā kailā—bestowed great mercy; māsa-dui—for two months; teṅho—Śrīkānta Sena; prabhura nikaṭe—near Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; rahilā—stayed.
translation: Seeing Śrīkānta Sena, Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu bestowed causeless mercy upon him. Śrīkānta Sena stayed near Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu for about two months at Jagannātha Purī.
